name: Illusionist
description: Your goal is deception. You weave complex illusions designed to baffle or confuse your foes. You are a master of deceit.

exploits.name: Change Self
exploits.description: You can make superficial changes to your appearance at will: hair color, clothing, facial hair, and so on. You cannot change race or gender, or impersonate a specific person.

exploits.name: Illusory Attack
exploits.description: You make a ranged or melee attack against a target, but it targets their Mental Defense and does psychic damage. You can describe the attack how you wish; it does 2d6 psychic damage. You can take this exploit a second time to increase the damage to 3d6 psychic damage.

exploits.name: Illusory Perception
exploits.description: You can’t fool a fooler. You automatically recognize illusions for what they are.

exploits.name: Invisibility
exploits.description: Once per day you may become invisible for one minute.

exploits.name: True Sight
exploits.description: You automatically see through illusions and disguises, you can see invisible creatures, and you can discern the true shape of a shapechanged creature.
